mapper.select:
SELECT id,
FROM supplier WHERE `status` < 9
AND `tenantId` = #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND TRIM(CONCAT_WS('', `keyword`)) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{term})), '%')
SELECT * FROM supplier WHERE `status` < 9 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM supplier WHERE `status` < 9 AND id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM supplier WHERE `status` < 9 AND `name` = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
UPDATE supplier SET updateTime = sysdate()
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM supplier WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
